modName: 83Willows - beautiful ORCs - Lady KIRUNA and Warrior TERRUN
summary:
Level 1 ORC Savegame - right after Escape from Helgen

Mystical Orc Lady KIRUNA + Veteran Orc Warrior TERR'UN .
(I have grabbed all valueable and useful things inside!) + included a full forsworn armor set for Kiruna!

They both have the best qualities you could find in their race - and are pleasing to the
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/0RCs1Kopie.jpg[/img]
[size="4"]Veteran Warrior TERR'UN + Mystical Lady KIRUNA[/size]

Version 2: saved AFTER Helgen and includes a full forsworn armor in KIRUNAs Savegame,
>>> merged with my male Orc Savegame - a brave, veteran Orc Warrior named TERR'UN
NEW needed and recommended mods - see description and images for more information!
In my opinion (female+male) orc-characters are totally underrated and not the first choice for a lot of people - but I hope some of you
will give them a chance - they deserve it! Orcs can also be cute, smart and skilled, and some are even beautiful! ;)



Make sure to take a look at my new mod >>>[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11371]Willows Whiter Teeth[/url]
More beautiful, brighter TEETH and natural+healthy mouth-colors for all RACES (+VAMPIRES, +WEREWOLFS). For all NPCs and your player characters!
[size=3]Especially ORCs look a lot better with their new whiter teeth and improved tongue-color! :)[/size]
[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Teeth1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Feedback_2yellow.jpg[/img]
. . . (comments, uploaded images, constructive critizism, . . .)



Official HD DLC Pack Compatibility - Step by Step Guide
If you are using the official HD_Texture_Pack you have to follow this little guide to make it compatible with my Savegame
(because the used Texture-Mods would not show up otherwise)! Dont worry - it is really simple and safe - just follow the 4 steps:

1. Go to your Skyrim.ini, usually located in Documents/My Games/Skyrim. Make a backup!
2. In the Skryim.ini find the section called [Archive], and add the information for the HiResTexturePack.bsa files so that it looks exactly like this:

[Archive]
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa
sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa

3. Save the .ini with the new settings
4. Disable/Delete HiResTexturePack01.esp and HiResTexturePack02.esp
You don't need them anymore to run the dlc-textures because of the above .ini changes.


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Kiruna2.jpg[/img]
Kiruna is the twin Sister of my main player-character "Claymora". She is a loveley orc-lady and I already enjoyed about 85 hours of playing with her.
I made lots of screenshots which I shared on this site - and because my female orc got many compliments I recreated her to get a level 1 savegame
which I could share with all of you!

Kiruna already wears a forsworn armor - I have included it in her savegame because the headdress is the perfect "hairstyle" for her.
(If you don't want to "cheat" just drop the 4 forsworn items and play a totally regular game with her)


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Kiruna1.jpg[/img]
>>> REAL DREADLOCKS Headdress retexture (see IMAGES for color examples): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5865]sexy Real Dreadlocks[/url]
NONREPLACING - all-in-ONE-file AVAILABLE (all colors - craftable (3 versions) - for all races (+beastraces) male and female!)
My own mod to improve the look of the female forsworn headdress - Kiruna was the reason I created this mod - to make her even more beautiful
and give her a perfectly matching new haircolor (blonde,... or whichever color you prefer!)

>>> Face-Skintone: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url] choose a natural version (I recommend look 3 - but you can also download the old version nr.1)

>>> Body-Skintone: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=18]No Dirty Bodies[/url] for her skin - best matching skintone for the "coverwomen"-face retexture

>>> Eyes: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]Covereyes[/url] (I really like them but you can also use another type of HD-eye textures...)


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Terrun2.jpg[/img]
Terr'un is my try to make an impressive, powerful and brave orc who doesn't look too brutal or stupid.
It wasn't an easy task (one word TEETH!) - but I think he turned out quite well!
His white hair matches his war-paint and gives him the experienced look I wanted for him.
He wears his scars proudly and maybe some day he will even tell you how he got them!

Terr'un can be everything you want - warrior surly comes to mind - but I think he could even be a powerfull battle mage
(imagine an orc as archmage!). He is very intelligent, otherwise he wouldn't have survived that long,
strength alone can't win every fight!

Give him a chance to be your dragonborn and experience Skyrim through his eyes!


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Terrun1.jpg[/img][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=256]Detailed Bodies[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30]No More Blocky Faces[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=498]High Quality Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=334]SEAMLESS cleaner Male Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2207]Telthalions Finer Hair[/url](desaturated)

If you want him to look exactly like the pictures - download them - otherwise they are not necessary to play with Terr'un
- he is "pretty" enought without any mods! ;)


[img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p483/8383Willow/Orc_ingame.jpg[/img]
If you want to change some details of Kirunas or Terr'uns look ingame (eyecolor, warpaint, haircolor, NAME)
you can use the game console (its really easy!):

1. to open the console use the tilde-key (~) (left side - above TAB)

2. type in: showracemenu

3. klick the tilde-key again to close the console

4. now you can change her/him to you likings in the character menu
(just like you would with a normal new character at the beginning of the game)

5. Press R when you are finished - (re)name your character and press enter!



Enjoy Skyrim with your new orcish dragonborn!

Thanks for downloading!
Please leave a comment if you enjoy playing with Kiruna or Terr'un
(You can also upload an image of your adventures with her/him!)

:)


Credits to all modders who created the wonderful mods I used for character creation and screenshots.
